title: 联机局域网怎么用插件呢？
author: 微尘丶
txt_content: 联机局域网怎么用插件呢？

replies.author: t1963698913
replies.txt_content: 客户端的局域网是不能用插件的必须用服务端开服

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 局域网不可安装插件，只可原版游戏

replies.author: WSCAOGENG
replies.txt_content:
给玩家添加权限
/manuaddp 玩家ID essentials.teleport.cooldown.bypass
权限是essentials.teleport.cooldown.bypass
